name: Milk powder

specification.Packaging: Multi-layer bags, drums, or as specified

benefits.title: Nutrient Fortification
benefits.description: Can be fortified with vitamins and minerals, improving nutrient intake.

benefits.title: Increased Shelf Life
benefits.description: Encourages milk consumption where access to fresh milk is limited, providing essential nutrients like calcium.

description: Milk powder is made by removing most of the water content from liquid milk through a drying process. It offers a long shelf life and versatility in various culinary and nutritional applications.
